name: The Legend of Snake
description:
Play the classic Snake game  but as your favorite, lovable swordsman: Link (in the King of Red Lions boat)! 

Use your keyboard arrow keys to change direction, avoid Chuchus, and collect rupees to max out your wallet!

But remember you can't move backwards! Avoid Chuchus and collect rupees to max out your wallet!

--Made in Godot for a class project
